personas_with_mappings.persona_name: North America Enterprise Marketplaces - Revenue Leaders

mappings.pain_point: Marketplace finance leaders struggle with delayed seller payouts and manual reconciliation, causing cash flow bottlenecks and rising support costs.
mappings.value_proposition: Connect automates seller onboarding, split payments, and payouts, reducing payout errors and reconciliation time by up to 70% while lowering support tickets.

mappings.pain_point: Revenue teams lose GMV to cross-region fraud and chargebacks, increasing costs and eroding buyer/seller trust.
mappings.value_proposition: Radar blocks fraudulent payments in real time using global signals; Radar can reduce chargebacks and fraud losses by up to 40% while preserving legitimate conversions.

mappings.pain_point: Compliance teams struggle to scale KYC and tax reporting across jurisdictions, exposing the platform to regulatory risk and slowing market launches.
mappings.value_proposition: Identity and Tax automate KYC checks plus sales tax/VAT calculation and filings, cutting manual compliance work by >60% and accelerating new region launches.

mappings.pain_point: Finance lacks visibility into platform cash positions and float, causing missed investment opportunities and liquidity risk.
mappings.value_proposition: Treasury centralizes balances and programmable cash operations so teams control funds programmatically, reducing idle cash by ~30% and improving liquidity management.

mappings.pain_point: Marketplace leaders can't attribute refunds and disputes to seller vs platform causes, masking revenue leakage and inflating dispute rates.
mappings.value_proposition: Sigma (analytics) delivers transaction-level dashboards and SQL reporting to identify refund drivers and actionable fixes, helping cut dispute volume by ~20%.

mappings.pain_point: Large seller networks need fast access to working capital but slow underwriting limits seller growth and reduces platform GMV expansion.
mappings.value_proposition: Capital offers revenue-based financing using platform transaction data, giving sellers access to growth capital in days to accelerate inventory and GMV expansion.

personas_with_mappings.persona_name: United States Mid-Market E-commerce - Commerce Leaders

mappings.pain_point: Commerce leaders see high cart abandonment on mobile and cross-border orders, reducing conversion and top-line growth.
mappings.value_proposition: Checkout provides prebuilt, localized payment flows and fraud protections to boost authorization and mobile conversion rates by up to 15%.

mappings.pain_point: Payment operations waste hours reconciling online and in-store sales, delaying close and increasing operational costs.
mappings.value_proposition: Payments and Terminal unify online and in-person transactions into one ledger, cutting reconciliation time by up to 60% and speeding financial close.

mappings.pain_point: Brands struggle to manage sales tax across states and marketplaces, risking fines and high remediation costs.
mappings.value_proposition: Tax automates tax calculation and filing across jurisdictions at checkout, reducing manual compliance effort by >70% and lowering audit risk.

mappings.pain_point: Subscription and recurring revenue teams lose customers to billing errors and manual invoicing, increasing churn.
mappings.value_proposition: Billing automates invoicing, proration, and usage tracking to reduce billing errors and lower churn by up to 25%.

mappings.pain_point: Small engineering teams can't iterate on checkout UX quickly, slowing A/B tests and conversion optimization.
mappings.value_proposition: Elements provides customizable payment UI blocks developers can ship in hours, accelerating checkout experiments and reducing time-to-launch by weeks.

mappings.pain_point: Customer refunds and returns create a support backlog and slow refund processing, harming retention.
mappings.value_proposition: Refunds automates return flows and reconciles accounting entries, cutting refund processing time by ~80% and improving customer satisfaction.

personas_with_mappings.persona_name: California Large B2B SaaS - Finance & Ops Leaders

mappings.pain_point: Finance leaders face revenue leakage from failed renewals and manual collections, raising DSO and hurting cash flow.
mappings.value_proposition: Billing with Invoicing automates renewals and embedded payments to reduce failed renewals and lower DSO by up to 20%.

mappings.pain_point: Complex usage-based billing and manual revenue recognition delay month-end close and strain accounting resources.
mappings.value_proposition: Billing automates usage metering and integrates with accounting systems, shortening billing cycles and accelerating close by up to 30%.

mappings.pain_point: Finance lacks real-time, product-level revenue insights, slowing pricing and GTM decisions.
mappings.value_proposition: Sigma (analytics) delivers SQL-powered dashboards on payments and churn, cutting analysis time by ~70% and enabling faster pricing decisions.

mappings.pain_point: AP/AR teams spend hours matching receipts to invoices, increasing headcount needs and manual errors.
mappings.value_proposition: Payments and Invoicing sync transactions and automate reconciliation, reducing manual matching work by ~80% and lowering overhead.

mappings.pain_point: Global customers face payment failures from outdated card details, causing involuntary churn and lost ARR.
mappings.value_proposition: Financial Connections and Payments speed bank linking and on-file updates to reduce payment failures and involuntary churn by up to 40%.

mappings.pain_point: CFOs need fast, non-dilutive capital for product and hiring but traditional underwriting takes weeks.
mappings.value_proposition: Capital provides revenue-backed financing using Stripe data, delivering working capital in days to fund growth initiatives without equity dilution.

personas_with_mappings.persona_name: United Kingdom Small Marketplaces - Founders & Product

mappings.pain_point: Founders struggle to launch seller payouts quickly, delaying go-to-market and reducing early platform momentum.
mappings.value_proposition: Connect enables quick seller onboarding and payout flows, letting founders enable first payouts in weeks and accelerate marketplace launches.

mappings.pain_point: Limited engineering bandwidth makes building a localized checkout costly, slowing UK buyer conversion.
mappings.value_proposition: Payment Links and Checkout provide no-code and hosted localized checkout pages so teams can accept payments instantly and improve conversion.

mappings.pain_point: Small marketplaces can't scale seller verification manually, increasing fraud and compliance risk even with few users.
mappings.value_proposition: Identity automates document and identity checks for KYC, cutting manual verification time by ~80% and reducing bad actors.

mappings.pain_point: Refunds and disputes handling drains founders' time, harming buyer experience and retention.
mappings.value_proposition: Refunds automates return flows, updates accounting records, and reduces refund handling time by ~70%, improving buyer trust.

mappings.pain_point: Product teams lack transaction-level visibility into fees and margins, making pricing and marketplace economics opaque.
mappings.value_proposition: Sigma (analytics) surfaces granular transaction and fee reports without a BI stack, cutting reporting time and enabling faster margin optimizations.

mappings.pain_point: Operations leaders manage inconsistent guest payments across online and in-store channels, causing reconciliation errors and slow settlement.
mappings.value_proposition: Terminal and Payments unify card-present and online transactions into one ledger, cutting reconciliation errors by up to 70% and speeding settlement.

mappings.pain_point: High fraud and chargebacks in local markets increase costs and erode margins for multi-location hospitality groups.
mappings.value_proposition: Radar uses regional signals to detect fraud in real time, lowering chargebacks by up to 35% while preserving legitimate bookings.

mappings.pain_point: Multiple locations manually process vendor and staff payouts, increasing payroll errors and administrative overhead.
mappings.value_proposition: Payouts automates scheduled multi-currency vendor and staff payments, reducing manual payout errors and payroll admin time by ~80%.

mappings.pain_point: Teams need contactless and mobile checkout to meet guest expectations but integrations take too long to deploy.
mappings.value_proposition: Checkout and Elements provide prebuilt mobile flows and UI blocks that launch contactless experiences in days to improve guest throughput.

mappings.pain_point: Refunds and cancellations during peak season create operational backlogs and strain working capital.
mappings.value_proposition: Refunds automates returns and reconciliation, cutting processing time by ~75% and freeing cash flow during high-volume periods.

mappings.pain_point: Finance lacks daily cash visibility across venues, complicating supplier payments and cash planning.
mappings.value_proposition: Sigma and Treasury deliver daily cash dashboards and programmable balances to centralize funds and reduce idle cash by ~25%.
